text: "Love Addict" is the 7th single by Mika Nakashima. It peaked on the Oricon weekly charts at #5 and sold roughly 68,943 copies. ==Track listing== # Love Addict # Be in Silence # Aroma (Live) # Love Addict (Yukihiro Fukutomi Remix) # Love Addict (Instrumental) ==References== Category:2003 singles Category:Mika Nakashima songs
title: Love Addict (Mika Nakashima song)
